riddle_1.text:
I travel without walking,
Yet I never touch the ground.
Two strangers guide my journey,
Their footsteps are the only sound.
I have a roof but not a home,
A seat but not a throne.
Who am I, carried through the town窶能nWhile never moving on my own?
